landing.tagline:
Find work that fits you, with AI.
Smart, personal and surprising.
landing.description:
For everyone who thinks: "What do I really want with my work?"
Whether you're just starting, stuck, looking for something new, or just want to reorient yourself – Vinster provides overview, guidance and direction.

what_is_vinster.title: What is Vinster?
what_is_vinster.description: Vinster is a smart online tool that helps you discover which functions suit you.
what_is_vinster.based_on: Based on what you tell us — about what you like to do, what you find important and how you prefer to work — you get personal career advice with:
what_is_vinster.clear_action_plan: a clear action plan to realize your choice
what_is_vinster.no_tests: You don't have to fill in tests or make difficult choices. You tell. The AI tool listens. And gives direction.

what_do_you_get.title: What do you get?
what_do_you_get.subtitle: A career report with:
what_do_you_get.insight_interests: Insight into your interests and work preferences
what_do_you_get.job_suggestions: Suggestions for work that really fits you: two matching functions and one surprising one
what_do_you_get.research_plan: A concrete research plan to move forward
what_do_you_get.search_profile: A search profile for your final choice

process_steps.subtitle: How does it work?
process_steps.title: Together we discover step by step what interests you and how you like to work
process_steps.step1_desc: Discover when you are in your element
process_steps.step2_desc: Explore different possibilities that suit you
process_steps.step3_desc: Determine what is most important to you in your work
process_steps.step4_desc: Refine your choices and get a personal career report

data_safety.title: 100% Safe & GDPR-compliant
data_safety.description: Your data is completely safe and GDPR-compliant. We use AI models to generate your personal insights, but your data is never stored by these models. Everything remains private and confidential with you.

flexible_journey.title: One time through, all the time you need
flexible_journey.description: You go through the program once, but you can think as long as you want between steps. Take all the time you need to think about the questions - your data remains always accessible when you return. No time pressure, no expiration date.

landing.testimonial: "It's impressive that a few questions can produce such suitable functions!"
